```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

coerce data frame to tibble using as_tibble function
```{r}
as_tibble(iris)
```

creating tibbles
```{r}
tibble(
  x = 1:5, 
  y = 1, 
  z = x^2 + 7
)
```

tibbles can use non-traditional R naming conventions
```{r}
tb <- tibble(
  `:)` = "smile", 
  ` ` = "space", 
  `2000` = "number"
)

tb
```

tribble allows for data entry into R
```{r}
## column headings start with ~ symbol
## separate with , 
## delineate header with # symbol for style. optional
tribble(
  ~x, ~y, ~z, 
  #--|--|----
  "a", 2, 3.6, 
  "b", 1, 8.5
)
```
